text: Antwerp is a town in Jefferson County, New York, United States. The population was 1,683 at the 2020 census. The town is named after Antwerp in Belgium, the home of one of the early investors in the town.History of Antwerp, NY (accessed 24 August 2019) The town of Antwerp contains a village also called Antwerp. The town is at the eastern corner of the county and is northeast of Watertown. ==References== Category:Towns in New York (state)
title: Antwerp, New York
